title: sap.fe.macros.controls.BuildingBlockWithTemplating
content:
# sap.fe.macros.controls.BuildingBlockWithTemplating

Using this class you can define a building block that will manage and render a templating based building block. On change of the main properties you will be able to recreate the content.

**Type:** class **Module:** sap/fe/macros/controls/BuildingBlockWithTemplating
